title: Rak Nee Hua Jai Rao Jong
overview: Phuwanai is the only son of Dr.Phutas, a geologist. He worked as a photographer for a feature magazine in USA. After being away from Thailand for so long, he goes back for a vacation. He vacations in Krabi and borrows a boat to go out to the sea for squid fishing at night.Ravinna, is a famous model. She comes to see her mother who called her to see her in the yacht in the sea. Ravinna doesn't know that her mother sold her to a man Buang Suang because she wants the money for gambling. In the yacht, BuangSuang tries to rape Ravinna but she jumps into the sea to get away from him.She swims and sees Phuwanai's boat, so she tries to get in to his boat, and it ends up collapsing, leaving them both stranded in the middle of the ocean. They both float to a deserted island and try to figure out how to get back home all the while fighting and bickering with each other.Later, Phuwanai makes a raft, so he and Ravinna can get back to the main land. But after they arrive, they are hunted by Buang Suang's jackals, so they have to get away together and find the way back to Bangkok. Their long adventure causes the two to start falling for each other.
